text: Marko Stevović (, ; born 1 February 1996) is a Serbian alpine skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Alpine skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Serbian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Serbia Category:Competitors at the 2017 Winter Universiade
title: Marko Stevović
